wikipedia_page.main: John Caven (born 6 July 1934) was a Scottish professional football outside left who played in the Football League for Brentford. He began his career in Scotland with Kilmarnock.

response: *John Caven (American politician) (1824–1905), Indiana politician and Freemason
*John Caven (Canadian politician) (born c. 1838), Ontario farmer and political figure
